name: LearningCurve
0:
”Alexa, ask Learning Curve to list english alphabets”
”Alexa, ask Learning Curve to start counting from 1 to 100”
”Alexa, ask Learning Curve to say alphabets in reverse order”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: learning curve
des: 'Learning Curve' a simple skill to shout English Alphabets and Numbers. Also supports english alphabets in the reverse order. Ask 'Learning Curve' to say the numbers and also to begin countdown.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
